name: Medieval Playground
description: Explore-Dig-Build-Play that's what you can do in Medieval Playground. Four types of terrain for your playground. Place and edit trees, animals, people and buildings to your liking. Make battles with allies and enemies and choose your side. Create underground caves and decorate them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 620 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
